gw.testharness

Class CurrentUserTestUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.testharness.CurrentUserTestUtil

  • public class CurrentUserTestUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utilities for modifying the current user during tests.
    Author:
    pdalbora

    • Method Detail

      • runAs

        public static void runAs(User user,
                         GWRunnable block)
        Runs the given block of code as the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - user to set as current user
        block - block to run
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the user is a temporary user.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the block throws an exception, it is wrapped in a RuntimeException. This is to facilitate usage in tests, where you typically just want exceptions to propagate up the call stack and trapped by the test runner.

      • runAs

        public static void runAs(Key user,
                         GWRunnable block)
        Runs the given block of code as the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - user ID to set as current user
        block - block to run
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the user is a temporary user.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the block throws an exception, it is wrapped in a RuntimeException. This is to facilitate usage in tests, where you typically just want exceptions to propagate up the call stack and trapped by the test runner.

        Runs the task as a system user
        Parameters:

        public static void setCurrentUser(User user)
        Sets the current user for the current thread. This change only affects the current thread

        public static User getCurrentUser()
